original_text: God made the different kinds of wild animals and the different kinds of farm animals. He made all the different kinds of animals that move along the ground.
korean_text: 하나님이 땅의 짐승을 그 종류대로, 가축을 그 종류대로, 땅에 기는 모든 것을 그 종류대로 만드시니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: God made the different kinds of wild animals
and the different kinds of farm animals
He made all the different kinds of animals
